import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import SideMenu from './SideMenu' import TableOne from './TableOne' function Summary(props) { const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); for (let i = 0; i < props.folders.length; i++){ for (let j = 0; j < props.folders[i].data.length; j++){ setProducts(...products , props.folders[i].data[j]); } } return ( <>
Product Summary

IMS

Products

{products.length}

Products

{products.reduce((acc, product) => acc + product.price, 0)}

Total Price

{products.reduce((acc, product) => acc + product.price * product.quantity, 0)}

Grand Total

) } export default Summary
